input_email_body:
Subject: Medical Data Encryption Failing

Hello customer support, I am contacting you to report an issue with the encryption of my medical data. It seems there might be a problem with software compatibility. I've already restarted the servers and updated Avast, but the issue still remains My name is Maria Gonzalez.. Could you please look into this and offer a solution at your earliest convenience? If you require any further details, please feel free to ask. You can reach me at maria.gonzalez@shop.es.
